name: Facebook Material Design
description:
Since Facebook is planning a major redesign of their platform, this style will also be updated accordingly, but without the "Night mode" since it will officially be available by Facebook. Link to the repo: GitHub Now with animated reactions, the ones you see on facebook's Android and iOS applications. It also has elements of "Vivify.css", the "pullUp" effect.
TO COMPLETELY BLOCK ADS ON FACEBOOK, INSTALL uBlock Origin
Since facebook is using React.js, which is a library that re-uses components, there are some styles that must stay default, because if I style them, on the other page that same component becomes very ugly and on the other it is ok. Therefore I can't style everything.
DARK MODE IS WORK IN PROGRESS - EARLY ALPHA. IT BARELY WORKS!
additional_info:
Browser compatibility:
Google Chrome / Chromium => 100%
Firefox => 100% The style has some nice and smooth animations which I think you'll like. They are available for news feed, pictures and messenger. ? When it comes to "Dark Mode", the colors are stored in variables. So, if you want to change the color of "Dark Mode", open the editor and edit them in :root The regular updates are just some minor fixes.
